column4: Hi, my left click seems to break after using it for a while and I need to restart the XServer,(on a thinkpad T510) the amount of time it takes to stop working varies, pluggin in a usb mice and the usb mice can't left click either, any suggestions or pointers to threads with similar problems?
What's the mouse doing not interactive when you move it?
what do you mean not interative? It still moves, right clicking still works(right clicking used to stop working a bit of time after left clicking but I haven't seen that recently)
I think it's a bug in 11.10 given when I used the mouse it would just freeze for 10 seconds and wouldn't react when I moved the mouse
no it moves fine clicking just stops working till I restart X
